title: Understanding the anti-corrosion characteristics of surface modification of h-BN and carbon nanotubes/magnesium composites in simulated seawater
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24152-24164
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04076G, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Victor Sunday Aigbodion, Abdulmajeed Abdullah Alayyaf, Chinemerem Jerry Ozoude
Here, we investigate the effects of incorporating hexagonal boron nitride (h-BN) into magnesium-carbon nanotubes (Mg-0.5wt% CNTs) nanocomposites. Adding 4 wt% h-BN to the Mg-0.5 wt% CNT nanocomposites can improve the wettability between Mg and CNTs and enhance the corrosion resistance properties.
